title: Making my way
lyrics: Tone   Moon looking bright tonight High in the sky Like trying to keep you a live, alright Just stay away from me Let me down easi ly You're too late you're too late Don't you pray don't you pray Seeking for my em brace Wanting my touch, begging me to stay Every night and day Calling my name, shout it till you break You took my heart, Held it and ripped it apart Make me your priso ner, Got me going right under Feeling that you feign ? Folling me again… . Folling me again… . Folling me again… .
